item.title: Profit & Loss
item.description: Overview Here you can see how much your company has earned or has lost during each month of the current year, the “Profit & Loss” row shows you this piece of information. This data is obtained by subtracting from the revenuesÂ of all the costs faced by the company. The costs can be of various kinds: External costs Payroll G & A Marketing We provide you with two subtotal in order to better understand the final value of profit & loss for the company:
